sentences.en: Different individuals are innately fitted for different kinds of employment.
sentences.cn: 不同的人适合不同的职业,这是天生的.

sentences.en: Humans are innately inhumane; this explains much of the misery and suffering in the world.
sentences.cn: 人类在本质上是不人道的; 这能够解释世界上的许多不幸和痛苦.

sentences.en: I believe everyone is innately psychic.
sentences.cn: 我相信每个人天生都有超自然的能力。

sentences.en: Innately conservative, Confucius was fascinated by the last of these disciplines.
sentences.cn: 由于生性保守, 孔子特别推崇“礼”.

sentences.en: Most human beings seem innately averse to change.
sentences.cn: 大多数人内心里似乎都不喜欢变化.

sentences.en: Needn't envy again those are full of persons of sport cells innately!
sentences.cn: 不用再羡慕那些天生就充满运动细胞的人!

sentences.en: Those with the Pluto - Moon are innately predisposed to have intense emotional reactions to the around them.
sentences.cn: 那些有月冥相位的人倾向于对外界世界有强烈的情绪反映.

sentences.en: We cannot innately grasp concepts in probability, horizontal causality, and simultaneous logic.
sentences.cn: 我们不可能天生理解概率 、 横向因果关系及同步逻辑方面的各种概念.

words.tran_cn: 先天的；固有的；与生俱来的
